text: Jharsuguda Road railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Jharsuguda. Its code is JSGR. It has two platforms. Passenger, Express and Superfast trains halt at Jharsuguda Road railway station. ==Major Trains== * Hirakud Express * Indore - Puri Humsafar Express ==See also== * Jharsuguda District ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jharsuguda district Category:Chakradharpur railway division
title: Jharsuguda Road railway station
